question: Is it alright if when you are talking about angels you say ‘he’ or if not what do you.
answer:
QUESTION
like if I say he will be coming when you die i.e angel of death,do we call them he or she if neither what do we call them
ANSWER


Share:
The gender of the angels is unknown. It is incorrect to attach any gender to the angels. (Sharhul Aqaaid pg.141; Imdadiyah)

The word ?he? may be used without intending the male gender.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
